name: Treasure Masters, Inc.: The Lost City
description: Join a pair of treasure hunters as they race around the world to be the first to find a lost city! Designed for fans of classic hidden object games and offering one thrill after another, Treasure Masters, Inc.: The Lost City will leave you breathless!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or later Processor: 1.5 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 256 MB 3D video card DirectX: Version 8.1 Storage: 700 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: 1.5 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 512 MB 3D video card DirectX: Version 8.1 Storage: 700 MB available space
